PYTHON SPECIFIC RESOURCES

Build Temporal Applications with the Python SDK.

Temporal Python Technical Resources:
- Python API Documentation: https://python.temporal.io/
- Python SDK Code Samples: https://github.com/temporalio/samples-python
- Python SDK Github: https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-python
- Temporal 101 in Python Free Course: https://learn.temporal.io/courses/temporal_101/python/

Get Connected with the Temporal Python Community:
- Temporal Python Community Slack: https://app.slack.com/client/TNWA8QCGZ
- Python SDK Forum: https://community.temporal.io/tag/python-sdk

Core Application
Use the essential components of a Temporal Application (Workflows, Activities, and Workers) to build and run a Temporal application.
- Develop a Basic Workflow: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/core-application.html#develop-workflows
- Develop a Basic Activity: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/core-application.html#develop-activities
- Start an Activity Execution: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/core-application.html#activity-execution
- Run Worker Processes: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/core-application.html#run-a-dev-worker

Temporal Client
Connect to a Temporal Service and start a Workflow Execution.
- Connect to Development Temporal Service: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/temporal-clients.html#connect-to-development-service
- Connect a Temporal Client to a Temporal Service: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/temporal-clients.html#connect-to-a-dev-cluster
- Connect to Temporal Cloud: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/temporal-clients.html#connect-to-temporal-cloud
- Start a Workflow Execution: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/temporal-clients.html#start-workflow-execution

Python SDK Sandbox
Use third-party Python modules without non-deterministic behavior.
https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/python-sdk-sandbox.html

Python SDK sync vs. async implementations
Implement synchronous or asynchronous Activities.
https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/python-sdk-sync-vs-async.html

Testing
Set up the testing suite and test Workflows and Activities.
- Test Frameworks: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/testing-suite.html#test-frameworks
- Testing Activities: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/testing-suite.html#test-activities
- Testing Workflows: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/testing-suite.html#test-workflows
- How to Replay a Workflow Execution: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/testing-suite.html#replay

Failure detection
Explore how your application can detect failures using timeouts and automatically attempt to mitigate them with retries.
- Workflow Timeouts: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/failure-detection.html#workflow-timeouts
- Set Activity Timeouts: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/failure-detection.html#activity-timeouts
- Heartbeat an Activity: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/failure-detection.html#activity-heartbeats

Workflow message passing
Send messages to and read the state of Workflow Executions.
- Develop with Signals: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/message-passing.html#signals
- Develop with Queries: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/message-passing.html#queries
- Develop with Updates: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/message-passing.html#updates
- What is a Dynamic Handler: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/message-passing.html#dynamic-handler

Interrupt a Workflow feature guide
Interrupt a Workflow Execution with a Cancel or Terminate action.
- Cancel a Workflow: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/cancellation.html#cancellation
- Terminate a Workflow: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/cancellation.html#termination
- Cancel an Activity from a Workflow: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/cancellation.html#cancel-activity

Asynchronous Activity completion
Complete Activities asynchronously.
https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/asynchronous-activity-completion.html

Versioning
Change Workflow Definitions without causing non-deterministic behavior in running Workflows.
- Introduction to Versioning: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/versioning.html#introduction-to-versioning
- How to Use the Patching API: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/versioning.html#python-sdk-patching-api
- How to Use Worker Versioning: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/versioning.html#worker-versioning

Observability
Configure and use the Temporal Observability APIs.
- Emit Metrics: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/observability.html#metrics
- Set up tracing: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/observability.html#tracing
- Log from a Workflow: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/observability.html#logging
- Use Visibility APIs: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/observability.html#visibility

Debugging
Explore various ways to debug your application.
https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/debugging.html

Schedules
Run Workflows on a schedule and delay the start of a Workflow.
- Schedule a Workflow: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/schedules.html#schedule-a-workflow
- Temporal Cron Jobs: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/schedules.html#temporal-cron-jobs
- Start Delay: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/schedules.html#start-delay

Data encryption
Use compression, encryption, and other data handling by implementing custom converters and codecs.
- Custom Payload Codec: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/converters-and-encryption.html#custom-payload-codec
- Payload Conversion: https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/converters-and-encryption.html#payload-conversion

Durable Timers
Use Timers to make a Workflow Execution pause or "sleep" for seconds, minutes, days, months, or years.
https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/timers.html

Child Workflows
Explore how to spawn a Child Workflow Execution and handle Child Workflow Events.
https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/child-workflows.html

Continue-As-New
Continue the Workflow Execution with a new Workflow Execution using the same Workflow ID.
https://github.com/hotheat/llmstxt/blob/feat/html/temporal_docs/develop/python/continue-as-new.html
